TopicTitle: Just a nice Eve Return mission

Articles.Content:
hazard-ish just completed the Eve Rocks Challenge with a rather creative design, and an (involuntary) parachute-less return to Kerbin. I've seen plenty of mission reports and few are as well made as his. I think it's worth being shown around.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited January 2, 2015 by Laie

Very nice mission report indeed! Once again, +rep will be delivered to hazard-ish for his no-quicksave adventures.

Also, Interesting design for an Eve lander. I guess it makes it easier to expand than a traditional "circle" shaped lander.

Wow, this was unexpected - thank you! I had a blast going through countless iterations of the challenge and I have to say, I felt a genuine shock of panic when I realized I forgot my parachute at the end!
You're my new hero. As someone who's never left Kerbin's SOI, Eve terrifies me. Posts like this give me hope that I might some day return with a surface sample!
